imdb.title: Celebrity Scandals from Funny or Die
akas: Celebrity Scandals from Funny or Die (United States)
plot: Over the years Funny Or Die has travelled behind the scenes of your favorite movies and TV shows to witness some of the biggest stars being absolute a**holes. Welcome to volume 1 of our Celebrity Scandals.
